key.name: position-index
key.description: Position of the indicator relative to other indicators in the panel. 0 = at the beginning, -1 = at the end, positive numbers = specific position.

key.name: hide-price
key.description: When enabled, the Bitcoin price will be hidden and API requests will be stopped to save resources. The indicator will show "BTC = Hidden" instead.

key.name: use-custom-text
key.description: When enabled, use custom text instead of "Hidden" when price is hidden.

key.name: custom-hidden-text
key.description: Custom text to display instead of "Hidden" when price is hidden.

key.name: api-provider
key.description: Choose the API provider for Bitcoin price data. Possible values: 'coingecko', 'binance', 'bitstamp', 'gateio', 'mexc', 'huobi', 'hitbtc', 'bybit'

key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to update the Bitcoin price (in seconds). Minimum values: CoinGecko=30s, Binance=5s, Bitstamp=1s, Gate.io=1s, MEXC=1s, Huobi=1s, HitBTC=1s, Bybit=1s
